lead_paragraph: LeBron James was jolted forward when the massive crowd swelled from the sidewalks and into Cleveland's streets, surrounding the convertible that he and his family were riding in. This wasn't supposed to happen.

headline.main: The King of 2016: LeBron James Named AP Male Athlete of Year
headline.print_headline: The King of 2016: LeBron James Named AP Male Athlete of Year
